SPECIAL MEETING
SEPTEMBER 27, 2021
5:00 PM
SULLIVAN CHAMBER

~FINAL ACTIONS~
MEETING

Monday, September 27, 2021

TIME

5:00 PM

PRESIDING OFFICER

Mayor Sumbul Siddiqui

Sep 27, 2021

THE CITY COUNCIL WILL CONDUCT A SPECIAL MEETING TO
RECEIVE A PRESENTATION FROM SEVERAL YOUNG CIVIC
DESIGNERS REGARDING POTENTIAL REVISIONS OF THE
REPRESENTATION FOUND IN THE ACKERMANN ROOM.
